# NutricionApp

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://www.tidyverse.org/lifecycle/#experimental)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of NutricionApp is to provide an app to easily calculate Total Parental Nutrition values.

## App Usage

To use the app visit it [here](https://davidalbertofciencias.shinyapps.io/ProtocoloNutricion).

## Installation

If you wish to use from your PC you can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("alberto-mateos-mo/NutricionApp")
```

Just considered it is intended to be use in mobile phones.

## Code of Conduct
